verses.verse: וְאַבְרָהָ֣ם <WH85> And Abraham זָקֵ֔ן <WH2204> was old בָּ֖א <WH935> [and] well stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> in age וַֽיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD בֵּרַ֥ךְ <WH1288> had blessed אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> Abraham בַּכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> every

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְרָהָ֗ם <WH85> And Abraham אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַבְדּוֹ֙ <WH5650> servant זְקַ֣ן <WH2205> unto his eldest בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> of his house הַמֹּשֵׁ֖ל <WH4910> that ruled over בְּכָל־ <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֑וֹ שִֽׂים־ <WH7760> all that he had Put נָ֥א <WH4994> Please יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> I pray thee thy hand תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under יְרֵכִֽי׃ <WH3409> under my thigh

וְאַשְׁבִּ֣יעֲךָ֔ <WH7650> And I will make thee swear בַּֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> by the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וֵֽאלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> and the God הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom לֹֽא־ <WH3808> you shall not תִקַּ֤ח <WH3947> that thou shalt not take אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> a wife לִבְנִ֔י <WH1121> unto my son מִבְּנוֹת֙ <WH1323> of the daughters הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> of the Canaanites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> whom I dwell בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> among

כִּ֧י <WH3588> for אֶל־ <WH413> to אַרְצִ֛י <WH776> unto my country וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מוֹלַדְתִּ֖י <WH4138> and to my kindred תֵּלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> will go וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> and take אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> a wife לִבְנִ֥י <WH1121> unto my son לְיִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> Isaac

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about הָעֶ֔בֶד <WH5650> And the servant אוּלַי֙ <WH194> Suppose לֹא־ <WH3808> is not תֹאבֶ֣ה <WH14> will not be willing הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> unto him Peradventure the woman לָלֶ֥כֶת <WH1980> along אַחֲרַ֖י <WH310> me אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> unto this land הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> I הֶֽהָשֵׁ֤ב <WH7725> must I needs bring אָשִׁיב֙ <WH7725> again אֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְךָ֔ <WH1121> thy son אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> thou יָצָ֥אתָ <WH3318> from whence thou camest מִשָּֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> then אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> And Abraham הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> unto him Beware לְךָ֔ פֶּן־ <WH6435> not תָּשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> thither again אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנִ֖י <WH1121> my son שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there

יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> of heaven אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who לְקָחַ֜נִי <WH3947> which took me מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִי֮ <WH1> from my father's וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and from the land מֽוֹלַדְתִּי֒ <WH4138> of my kindred וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> and who דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> and which spake לִ֜י וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and who נִֽשְׁבַּֽע־ <WH7650> unto me and that sware לִי֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto me saying לְזַ֨רְעֲךָ֔ <WH2233> Unto thy seed אֶתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> will I give אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> this land הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise ה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> he shall send מַלְאָכוֹ֙ <WH4397> his angel לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before thee וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> and thou shalt take אִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> a wife לִבְנִ֖י <WH1121> unto my son מִשָּֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֨א <WH3808> is not תֹאבֶ֤ה <WH14> will not be willing הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> And if the woman לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> along אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <WH310> thee וְנִקִּ֕יתָ <WH5352> then thou shalt be clear מִשְּׁבֻעָתִ֖י <WH7621> from this my oath זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise רַ֣ק <WH7535> but אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנִ֔י <WH1121> not my son לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תָשֵׁ֖ב <WH7725> thither again שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> put הָעֶ֙בֶד֙ <WH5650> And the servant אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> his hand תַּ֛חַת <WH8478> under יֶ֥רֶךְ <WH3409> under the thigh אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> of Abraham אֲדֹנָ֑יו <WH113> his master וַיִּשָּׁ֣בַֽע <WH7650> and sware ל֔וֹ עַל־ <WH5921> to him concerning הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> matter הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> that

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took הָ֠עֶבֶד <WH5650> And the servant עֲשָׂרָ֨ה <WH6235> ten גְמַלִּ֜ים <WH1581> camels מִגְּמַלֵּ֤י <WH1581> of the camels אֲדֹנָיו֙ <WH113> of his master וַיֵּ֔לֶךְ <WH1980> and set וְכָל־ <WH3605> A variety ט֥וּב <WH2898> for all the goods אֲדֹנָ֖יו <WH113> of his master בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> [were] in his hand וַיָּ֗קָם <WH6965> and he arose וַיֵּ֛לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲרַ֥ם נַֽהֲרַ֖יִם <WH763> to Mesopotamia אֶל־ <WH413> to עִ֥יר <WH5892> unto the city נָחֽוֹר׃ <WH5152> of Nahor

וַיַּבְרֵ֧ךְ <WH1288> to kneel down הַגְּמַלִּ֛ים <WH1581> his camels מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> without לָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city אֶל־ <WH413> by בְּאֵ֣ר <WH875> a well הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> of water לְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> at the time עֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> of the evening לְעֵ֖ת <WH6256> [even] the time צֵ֥את <WH3318> that women go out הַשֹּׁאֲבֹֽת׃ <WH7579> to draw

וַיֹּאמַ֓ר ׀ <WH559> And he said יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> God אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> of my master אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> Abraham הַקְרֵה־ <WH7136> good speed נָ֥א <WH4994> please לְפָנַ֖י <WH6440> I pray thee send me הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> this day וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> and shew חֶ֕סֶד <WH2617> kindness עִ֖ם <WH5973> unto אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> my master אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <WH85> Abraham

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I נִצָּ֖ב <WH5324> Behold I stand עַל־ <WH5921> by עֵ֣ין <WH5869> [here] by the well הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> of water וּבְנוֹת֙ <WH1323> and the daughters אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> of the men הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city יֹצְאֹ֖ת <WH3318> come out לִשְׁאֹ֥ב <WH7579> to draw מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> now may it be that הַֽנַּעֲרָ֗ <WH5291> And let it come to pass that the damsel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to whom אֹמַ֤ר <WH559> to whom I shall say אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> about הַטִּי־ <WH5186> Let down נָ֤א <WH4994> Please כַדֵּךְ֙ <WH3537> thy pitcher וְאֶשְׁתֶּ֔ה <WH8354> I pray thee that I may drink וְאָמְרָ֣ה <WH559> and she shall say שְׁתֵ֔ה <WH8354> Drink וְגַם־ <WH1571> again גְּמַלֶּ֖יךָ <WH1581> thy camels אַשְׁקֶ֑ה <WH8248> drink אֹתָ֤הּ <WH853> הֹכַ֙חְתָּ֙ <WH3198> also [let the same be] she [that] thou hast appointed לְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> for thy servant לְיִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> Isaac וּבָ֣הּ אֵדַ֔ע <WH3045> and thereby shall I know כִּי־ <WH3588> that עָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> that thou hast shewed חֶ֖סֶד <WH2617> kindness עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> unto my master

וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> become ה֗וּא <WH1931> he טֶרֶם֮ <WH2962> Before כִּלָּ֣ה <WH3615> And it came to pass before he had done לְדַבֵּר֒ <WH1696> speaking וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> behold רִבְקָ֣ה <WH7259> that behold Rebekah יֹצֵ֗את <WH3318> came out אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יֻלְּדָה֙ <WH3205> was born לִבְתוּאֵ֣ל <WH1328> to Bethuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> son מִלְכָּ֔ה <WH4435> of Milcah אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> the wife נָח֖וֹר <WH5152> of Nahor אֲחִ֣י <WH251> brother אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> Abraham's וְכַדָּ֖הּ <WH3537> with her pitcher עַל־ <WH5921> on שִׁכְמָֽהּ׃ <WH7926> upon her shoulder

וְהַֽנַּעֲרָ֗ <WH5291> And the damsel טֹבַ֤ת <WH2896> fair מַרְאֶה֙ <WH4758> to look upon מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> [was] very בְּתוּלָ֕ה <WH1330> a virgin וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> neither had any man לֹ֣א <WH3808> and no יְדָעָ֑הּ <WH3045> known וַתֵּ֣רֶד <WH3381> her and she went down הָעַ֔יְנָה <WH5869> to the well וַתְּמַלֵּ֥א <WH4390> and filled כַדָּ֖הּ <WH3537> her pitcher וַתָּֽעַל׃ <WH5927> and came up

וַיָּ֥רָץ <WH7323> ran הָעֶ֖בֶד <WH5650> And the servant לִקְרָאתָ֑הּ <WH7125> to meet her וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said הַגְמִיאִ֥ינִי <WH1572> Let me I pray thee drink נָ֛א <WH4994> Please מְעַט־ <WH4592> a little מַ֖יִם <WH4325> water מִכַּדֵּֽךְ׃ <WH3537> of thy pitcher

וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And she said שְׁתֵ֣ה <WH8354> Drink אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> my lord וַתְּמַהֵ֗ר <WH4116> and she hasted וַתֹּ֧רֶד <WH3381> and let down כַּדָּ֛הּ <WH3537> her pitcher עַל־ <WH5921> unto יָדָ֖הּ <WH3027> upon her hand וַתַּשְׁקֵֽהוּ׃ <WH8248> and gave him drink

וַתְּכַ֖ל <WH3615> And when she had done לְהַשְׁקֹת֑וֹ <WH8248> giving him drink וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> she said גַּ֤ם <WH1571> also לִגְמַלֶּ֙יךָ֙ <WH1581> [water] for thy camels אֶשְׁאָ֔ב <WH7579> I will draw עַ֥ד <WH5704> against אִם־ <WH518> lo כִּלּ֖וּ <WH3615> also until they have done לִשְׁתֹּֽת׃ <WH8354> drinking

וַתְּמַהֵ֗ר <WH4116> And she hasted וַתְּעַ֤ר <WH6168> and emptied כַּדָּהּ֙ <WH3537> her pitcher אֶל־ <WH413> into הַשֹּׁ֔קֶת <WH8268> into the trough וַתָּ֥רָץ <WH7323> and ran ע֛וֹד <WH5750> back אֶֽל־ <WH413> to הַבְּאֵ֖ר <WH875> again unto the well לִשְׁאֹ֑ב <WH7579> to draw וַתִּשְׁאַ֖ב <WH7579> [water] and drew לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all גְּמַלָּֽיו׃ <WH1581> for all his camels

וְהָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> And the man מִשְׁתָּאֵ֖ה <WH7583> wondering לָ֑הּ מַחֲרִ֕ישׁ <WH2790> at her held his peace לָדַ֗עַת <WH3045> to wit הַֽהִצְלִ֧יחַ <WH6743> prosperous יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> whether the LORD דַּרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> his journey אִם־ <WH518> or לֹֽא׃ <WH3808> not

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after כִּלּ֤וּ <WH3615> had done הַגְּמַלִּים֙ <WH1581> And it came to pass as the camels לִשְׁתּ֔וֹת <WH8354> drinking וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> that the man נֶ֣זֶם <WH5141> earring זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> a golden בֶּ֖קַע <WH1235> of half a shekel מִשְׁקָל֑וֹ <WH4948> weight וּשְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> and two צְמִידִים֙ <WH6781> bracelets עַל־ <WH5921> for יָדֶ֔יהָ <WH3027> for her hands עֲשָׂרָ֥ה <WH6235> of ten זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold מִשְׁקָלָֽם׃ <WH4948> [shekels] weight

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And said בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter מִ֣י <WH4310> Whose אַ֔תְּ <WH859> you הַגִּ֥ידִי <WH5046> tell נָ֖א <WH4994> Please לִ֑י הֲיֵ֧שׁ <WH3426> me I pray thee is there בֵּית־ <WH1004> house אָבִ֛יךְ <WH1> [in] thy father's מָק֥וֹם <WH4725> room לָ֖נוּ לָלִֽין׃ <WH3885> for us to lodge in

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And she said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him בַּת־ <WH1323> unto him I [am] the daughter בְּתוּאֵ֖ל <WH1328> of Bethuel אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> I בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מִלְכָּ֕ה <WH4435> of Milcah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom יָלְדָ֖ה <WH3205> which she bare לְנָחֽוֹר׃ <WH5152> unto Nahor

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> She said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about גַּם־ <WH1571> moreover unto him We have both תֶּ֥בֶן <WH8401> straw גַּם־ <WH1571> and מִסְפּ֖וֹא <WH4554> and provender רַ֣ב <WH7227> enough עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> with גַּם־ <WH1571> of both מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> room לָלֽוּן׃ <WH3885> to lodge in
וַיִּקֹּ֣ד <WH6915> bowed down his head הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> And the man וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <WH7812> and worshipped לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said בָּר֤וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> God אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> of my master אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> Abraham אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not עָזַ֥ב <WH5800> forsaken חַסְדּ֛וֹ <WH2617> of his mercy וַאֲמִתּ֖וֹ <WH571> and his truth מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> with אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> my master אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> me בַּדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> I [being] in the way נָחַ֣נִי <WH5148> led me יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> to the house אֲחֵ֥י <WH251> brethren אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> of my master's

וַתָּ֙רָץ֙ <WH7323> ran הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ <WH5291> And the damsel וַתַּגֵּ֖ד <WH5046> and told לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אִמָּ֑הּ <WH517> [them of] her mother's כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וּלְרִבְקָ֥ה <WH7259> And Rebekah אָ֖ח <WH251> had a brother וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> and his name לָבָ֑ן <WH3837> [was] Laban וַיָּ֨רָץ <WH7323> ran לָבָ֧ן <WH3837> and Laban אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> unto the man הַח֖וּצָה <WH2351> out אֶל־ <WH413> unto הָעָֽיִן׃ <WH5869> unto the well

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become כִּרְאֹ֣ת <WH7200> And it came to pass when he saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֶּ֗זֶם <WH5141> the earring וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> הַצְּמִדִים֮ <WH6781> and bracelets עַל־ <WH5921> by יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> hands אֲחֹתוֹ֒ <WH269> upon his sister's וּכְשָׁמְע֗וֹ <WH8085> and when he heard אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֞י <WH1697> the words רִבְקָ֤ה <WH7259> of Rebekah אֲחֹתוֹ֙ <WH269> his sister לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus דִבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> spake אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> the man וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> unto me that he came אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> unto the man וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and behold עֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> and behold he stood עַל־ <WH5921> by הַגְּמַלִּ֖ים <WH1581> the camels עַל־ <WH5921> at הָעָֽיִן׃ <WH5869> at the well

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said בּ֖וֹא <WH935> Come in בְּר֣וּךְ <WH1288> thou blessed יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why תַעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> wherefore standest בַּח֔וּץ <WH2351> outside וְאָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I פִּנִּ֣יתִי <WH6437> have prepared הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> the house וּמָק֖וֹם <WH4725> and room לַגְּמַלִּֽים׃ <WH1581> for the camels

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> came הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> And the man הַבַּ֔יְתָה <WH1004> into the house וַיְפַתַּ֖ח <WH6605> and he ungirded הַגְּמַלִּ֑ים <WH1581> his camels וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> and gave תֶּ֤בֶן <WH8401> straw וּמִסְפּוֹא֙ <WH4554> and provender לַגְּמַלִּ֔ים <WH1581> for the camels וּמַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> and water לִרְחֹ֣ץ <WH7364> to wash רַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> his feet וְרַגְלֵ֥י <WH7272> feet הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> and the men's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

[וַיִּישֶׂם כ] (וַיּוּשַׂ֤ם <WH3455> be put ק) לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> [meat] before him לֶאֱכֹ֔ל <WH398> to eat וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> but he said לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֹכַ֔ל <WH398> I will not eat עַ֥ד <WH5704> against אִם־ <WH518> lo דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> until I have told דְּבָרָ֑י <WH1697> mine errand וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said דַּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> Speak on
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> And he said עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> servant אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> I [am] Abraham's אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> I

וַיהוָ֞ה <WH3068> And the LORD בֵּרַ֧ךְ <WH1288> hath blessed אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנִ֛י <WH113> my master מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> greatly וַיִּגְדָּ֑ל <WH1431> and he is become great וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and he hath given ל֞וֹ צֹ֤אן <WH6629> him flocks וּבָקָר֙ <WH1241> and herds וְכֶ֣סֶף <WH3701> and silver וְזָהָ֔ב <WH2091> and gold וַעֲבָדִם֙ <WH5650> and menservants וּשְׁפָחֹ֔ת <WH8198> and maidservants וּגְמַלִּ֖ים <WH1581> and camels וַחֲמֹרִֽים׃ <WH2543> and asses

וַתֵּ֡לֶד <WH3205> bare שָׂרָה֩ <WH8283> And Sarah אֵ֨שֶׁת <WH802> wife אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> my master's בֵן֙ <WH1121> a son לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <WH113> to my master אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> when זִקְנָתָ֑הּ <WH2209> she was old וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and unto him hath he given לּ֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לֽוֹ׃

וַיַּשְׁבִּעֵ֥נִי <WH7650> made me swear אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> And my master לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִקַּ֤ח <WH3947> Thou shalt not take אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> a wife לִבְנִ֔י <WH1121> to my son מִבְּנוֹת֙ <WH1323> of the daughters הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> of the Canaanites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> I dwell בְּאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> in whose land

אִם־ <WH518> But לֹ֧א <WH3808> not אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּית־ <WH1004> house אָבִ֛י <WH1> unto my father's תֵּלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> shall go וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מִשְׁפַּחְתִּ֑י <WH4940> and to my kindred וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> and take אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> a wife לִבְנִֽי׃ <WH1121> unto my son

וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> And I said אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> unto my master אֻלַ֛י <WH194> Suppose לֹא־ <WH3808> not תֵלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> along הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> Peradventure the woman אַחֲרָֽי׃ <WH310> after that

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> unto me The LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הִתְהַלַּ֣כְתִּי <WH1980> whom I walk לְפָנָ֗יו <WH6440> before יִשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> will send מַלְאָכ֤וֹ <WH4397> his angel אִתָּךְ֙ <WH854> for וְהִצְלִ֣יחַ <WH6743> with thee and prosper דַּרְכֶּ֔ךָ <WH1870> thy way וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <WH3947> and thou shalt take אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> a wife לִבְנִ֔י <WH1121> for my son מִמִּשְׁפַּחְתִּ֖י <WH4940> of my kindred וּמִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> and of my father's

אָ֤ז <WH227> then תִּנָּקֶה֙ <WH5352> Then shalt thou be clear מֵאָ֣לָתִ֔י <WH423> from [this] my oath כִּ֥י <WH3588> when תָב֖וֹא <WH935> when thou comest אֶל־ <WH413> to מִשְׁפַּחְתִּ֑י <WH4940> to my kindred וְאִם־ <WH518> and if לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> and if they give לָ֔ךְ וְהָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> become נָקִ֖י <WH5355> not thee [one] thou shalt be clear מֵאָלָתִֽי׃ <WH423> from my oath

וָאָבֹ֥א <WH935> And I came הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> this day אֶל־ <WH413> unto הָעָ֑יִן <WH5869> unto the well וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> and said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> God אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> of my master אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> Abraham אִם־ <WH518> if יֶשְׁךָ־ <WH3426> if now thou do נָּא֙ <WH4994> now מַצְלִ֣יחַ <WH6743> prosper דַּרְכִּ֔י <WH1870> my way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> which I go עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> behold אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I נִצָּ֖ב <WH5324> Behold I stand עַל־ <WH5921> by עֵ֣ין <WH5869> by the well הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> of water וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become הָֽעַלְמָה֙ <WH5959> and it shall come to pass that when the virgin הַיֹּצֵ֣את <WH3318> cometh forth לִשְׁאֹ֔ב <WH7579> to draw וְאָמַרְתִּ֣י <WH559> [water] and I say אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> about הַשְׁקִֽינִי־ <WH8248> to drink נָ֥א <WH4994> Please מְעַט־ <WH4592> I pray thee a little מַ֖יִם <WH4325> water מִכַּדֵּֽךְ׃ <WH3537> of thy pitcher

וְאָמְרָ֤ה <WH559> And she say אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about גַּם־ <WH1571> also אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You שְׁתֵ֔ה <WH8354> to me Both drink וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> also לִגְמַלֶּ֖יךָ <WH1581> for thy camels אֶשְׁאָ֑ב <WH7579> thou and I will also draw הִ֣וא <WH1931> he הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> [let] the same [be] the woman אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הֹכִ֥יחַ <WH3198> hath appointed out יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> whom the LORD לְבֶן־ <WH1121> son אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> for my master's

אֲנִי֩ <WH589> I טֶ֨רֶם <WH2962> Before אֲכַלֶּ֜ה <WH3615> And before I had done לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> speaking אֶל־ <WH413> in לִבִּ֗י <WH3820> in mine heart וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold רִבְקָ֤ה <WH7259> behold Rebekah יֹצֵאת֙ <WH3318> came forth וְכַדָּ֣הּ <WH3537> with her pitcher עַל־ <WH5921> on שִׁכְמָ֔הּ <WH7926> on her shoulder וַתֵּ֥רֶד <WH3381> and she went down הָעַ֖יְנָה <WH5869> unto the well וַתִּשְׁאָ֑ב <WH7579> and drew וָאֹמַ֥ר <WH559> [water] and I said אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> unto הַשְׁקִ֥ינִי <WH8248> unto her Let me drink נָֽא׃ <WH4994> to her Please

וַתְּמַהֵ֗ר <WH4116> And she made haste וַתּ֤וֹרֶד <WH3381> and let down כַּדָּהּ֙ <WH3537> her pitcher מֵֽעָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> from וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> from her [shoulder] and said שְׁתֵ֔ה <WH8354> Drink וְגַם־ <WH1571> also גְּמַלֶּ֖יךָ <WH1581> thy camels אַשְׁקֶ֑ה <WH8248> drink וָאֵ֕שְׁתְּ <WH8354> also so I drank וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> also הַגְּמַלִּ֖ים <WH1581> the camels הִשְׁקָֽתָה׃ <WH8248> drink

וָאֶשְׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> And I asked אֹתָ֗הּ <WH853> וָאֹמַר֮ <WH559> her and said בַּת־ <WH1323> Whose daughter מִ֣י <WH4310> Whose אַתְּ֒ <WH859> and she וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> [art] thou? And she said בַּת־ <WH1323> The daughter בְּתוּאֵל֙ <WH1328> of Bethuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> son נָח֔וֹר <WH5152> Nahor's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom יָֽלְדָה־ <WH3205> bare לּ֖וֹ מִלְכָּ֑ה <WH4435> whom Milcah וָאָשִׂ֤ם <WH7760> unto him and I put הַנֶּ֙זֶם֙ <WH5141> the earring עַל־ <WH5921> on אַפָּ֔הּ <WH639> upon her face וְהַצְּמִידִ֖ים <WH6781> and the bracelets עַל־ <WH5921> on יָדֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3027> upon her hands

וָאֶקֹּ֥ד <WH6915> And I bowed down my head וָֽאֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה <WH7812> and worshipped לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וָאֲבָרֵ֗ךְ <WH1288> and blessed אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> God אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> of my master אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> Abraham אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הִנְחַ֙נִי֙ <WH5148> which had led me בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> way אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> in the right לָקַ֛חַת <WH3947> to take אֶת־ <WH853> בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter אֲחִ֥י <WH251> brother's אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> my master's לִבְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> unto his son

וְ֠עַתָּה <WH6258> now אִם־ <WH518> if יֶשְׁכֶ֨ם <WH3426> And now if ye will עֹשִׂ֜ים <WH6213> deal חֶ֧סֶד <WH2617> kindly וֶֽאֱמֶ֛ת <WH571> and truly אֶת־ <WH854> with אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> with my master הַגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> tell לִ֑י וְאִם־ <WH518> and if לֹ֕א <WH3808> not הַגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> me and if not tell לִ֔י וְאֶפְנֶ֥ה <WH6437> me that I may turn עַל־ <WH5921> unto יָמִ֖ין <WH3225> to the right hand א֥וֹ <WH176> or עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂמֹֽאל׃ <WH8040> to the left

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered לָבָ֤ן <WH3837> Then Laban וּבְתוּאֵל֙ <WH1328> and Bethuel וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said מֵיְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD יָצָ֣א <WH3318> proceedeth הַדָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> The thing לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נוּכַ֛ל <WH3201> we cannot דַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> speak אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you רַ֥ע <WH7451> unto thee bad אוֹ־ <WH176> or טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> good

הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> Here רִבְקָ֥ה <WH7259> Behold Rebekah לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> [is] before thee קַ֣ח <WH3947> take וָלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> and go וּתְהִ֤י <WH1961> become אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> wife לְבֶן־ <WH1121> son's אֲדֹנֶ֔יךָ <WH113> and let her be thy master's כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> as the LORD

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after שָׁמַ֛ע <WH8085> heard עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> servant אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> And it came to pass that when Abraham's אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1697> their words וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <WH7812> he worshipped אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> [bowing himself] to the earth לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיּוֹצֵ֨א <WH3318> brought forth הָעֶ֜בֶד <WH5650> And the servant כְּלֵי־ <WH3627> jewels כֶ֨סֶף <WH3701> of silver וּכְלֵ֤י <WH3627> and jewels זָהָב֙ <WH2091> of gold וּבְגָדִ֔ים <WH899> and raiment וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> and gave לְרִבְקָ֑ה <WH7259> [them] to Rebekah וּמִ֨גְדָּנֹ֔ת <WH4030> precious things נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> he gave לְאָחִ֖יהָ <WH251> also to her brother וּלְאִמָּֽהּ׃ <WH517> and to her mother

וַיֹּאכְל֣וּ <WH398> And they did eat וַיִּשְׁתּ֗וּ <WH8354> and drink ה֛וּא <WH1931> he וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> and the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with וַיָּלִ֑ינוּ <WH3885> that [were] with him and tarried all night וַיָּק֣וּמוּ <WH6965> and they rose up בַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and he said שַׁלְּחֻ֥נִי <WH7971> Send me away לַֽאדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> unto my master

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אָחִ֙יהָ֙ <WH251> And her brother וְאִמָּ֔הּ <WH517> and her mother תֵּשֵׁ֨ב <WH3427> abide הַנַּעֲרָ֥ <WH5291> Let the damsel אִתָּ֛נוּ <WH854> for יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> with us [a few] days א֣וֹ <WH176> at the least עָשׂ֑וֹר <WH6218> ten אַחַ֖ר <WH310> after תֵּלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> may go

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תְּאַחֲר֣וּ <WH309> unto them Hinder me אֹתִ֔י <WH853> וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> not seeing the LORD הִצְלִ֣יחַ <WH6743> hath prospered דַּרְכִּ֑י <WH1870> my way שַׁלְּח֕וּנִי <WH7971> send me away וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> may go לַֽאדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> to my master
וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> And they said נִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> We will call לַֽנַּעֲרָ֑ <WH5291> the damsel וְנִשְׁאֲלָ֖ה <WH7592> and enquire אֶת־ <WH853> פִּֽיהָ׃ <WH6310> at her mouth

וַיִּקְרְא֤וּ <WH7121> And they called לְרִבְקָה֙ <WH7259> Rebekah וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> to her הֲתֵלְכִ֖י <WH1980> go עִם־ <WH5973> with הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> with הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> will go

וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֛וּ <WH7971> And they sent away אֶת־ <WH853> רִבְקָ֥ה <WH7259> Rebekah אֲחֹתָ֖ם <WH269> their sister וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֵנִקְתָּ֑הּ <WH3243> and her nurse וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> servant אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> and Abraham's וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲנָשָֽׁיו׃ <WH376> and his men

וַיְבָרֲכ֤וּ <WH1288> And they blessed אֶת־ <WH853> רִבְקָה֙ <WH7259> Rebekah וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> and said לָ֔הּ אֲחֹתֵ֕נוּ <WH269> [art] our sister אַ֥תְּ <WH859> unto her Thou הֲיִ֖י <WH1961> be thou לְאַלְפֵ֣י <WH505> [the mother] of thousands רְבָבָ֑ה <WH7233> of millions וְיִירַ֣שׁ <WH3423> possess זַרְעֵ֔ךְ <WH2233> and let thy seed אֵ֖ת <WH853> שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> the gate שֹׂנְאָֽיו׃ <WH8130> of those which hate

וַתָּ֨קָם <WH6965> arose רִבְקָ֜ה <WH7259> And Rebekah וְנַעֲרֹתֶ֗יהָ <WH5291> and her damsels וַתִּרְכַּ֙בְנָה֙ <WH7392> and they rode עַל־ <WH5921> and הַגְּמַלִּ֔ים <WH1581> upon the camels וַתֵּלַ֖כְנָה <WH1980> and departed אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after that הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> the man וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> took הָעֶ֛בֶד <WH5650> and the servant אֶת־ <WH853> רִבְקָ֖ה <WH7259> Rebekah וַיֵּלַֽךְ׃ <WH1980> and departed

וְיִצְחָק֙ <WH3327> And Isaac בָּ֣א <WH935> came מִבּ֔וֹא <WH935> from the way בְּאֵ֥ר לַחַ֖י רֹאִ֑י <WH883> of the well Lahairoi וְה֥וּא <WH1931> he יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> for he dwelt בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> country הַנֶּֽגֶב׃ <WH5045> in the south

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went out יִצְחָ֛ק <WH3327> And Isaac לָשׂ֥וּחַ <WH7742> to meditate בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> in the field לִפְנ֣וֹת <WH6437> at עָ֑רֶב <WH6153> the eventide וַיִּשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> and he lifted up עֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּ֔רְא <WH7200> and saw וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold גְמַלִּ֖ים <WH1581> and behold the camels בָּאִֽים׃ <WH935> [were] coming

וַתִּשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> lifted up רִבְקָה֙ <WH7259> And Rebekah אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֶ֔יהָ <WH5869> her eyes וַתֵּ֖רֶא <WH7200> and when she saw אֶת־ <WH853> יִצְחָ֑ק <WH3327> Isaac וַתִּפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> she lighted מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> off הַגָּמָֽל׃ <WH1581> the camel

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> For she [had] said אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעֶ֗בֶד <WH5650> unto the servant מִֽי־ <WH4310> What הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> man הַלָּזֶה֙ <WH1976> [is] this הַהֹלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> that walketh בַּשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> in the field לִקְרָאתֵ֔נוּ <WH7125> to meet us וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> [had] said הָעֶ֖בֶד <WH5650> ? And the servant ה֣וּא <WH1931> He אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> It [is] my master וַתִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> therefore she took הַצָּעִ֖יף <WH6809> a vail וַתִּתְכָּֽס׃ <WH3680> and covered herself

וַיְסַפֵּ֥ר <WH5608> told הָעֶ֖בֶד <WH5650> And the servant לְיִצְחָ֑ק <WH3327> Isaac אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> all things אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> that he had done

וַיְבִאֶ֣הָ <WH935> brought her יִצְחָ֗ק <WH3327> And Isaac הָאֹ֙הֱלָה֙ <WH168> tent שָׂרָ֣ה <WH8283> Sarah's אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> into his mother וַיִּקַּ֧ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> רִבְקָ֛ה <WH7259> Rebekah וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> became ל֥וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> and she became his wife וַיֶּאֱהָבֶ֑הָ <WH157> and he loved וַיִּנָּחֵ֥ם <WH5162> was comforted יִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> her and Isaac אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> his mother's פ
